descriptionHtml:
RR Motion Replacer v0.2


[Description]
  This Mod changes idle motion at the time of one hand weapon(+ shield) and 
  one hand weapon + magic equipment, and an one hand power attack motion. 

  These transplant to Skyrim what was made from Oblivion before. 


[How to install]
　Copy these files in the folder...
　/skyrim/data/meshes/actors/character/animations

  1hm_attackpower.hkx
  1hm_idle.hkx
  mlh_idle.hkx
  2hm_idle.hkx
  2hm_attackpower.hkx


[How to uninstall]
  Delete these files in the folder...
　/skyrim/data/meshes/actors/character/animations

  1hm_attackpower.hkx
  1hm_idle.hkx
  mlh_idle.hkx
  2hm_idle.hkx
  2hm_attackpower.hkx


[known problems]
  A pause is amusing in part at the time of a sneak. 


[At the end]
 The modification and the re-distribution of these files 
 are prohibited. 
 I wish to express my gratitude to Skyrim and you. 
 Enjoy!


 Presented by Reira
author: Reira
